string-array.name: survey
string-array.item: I often think about my mobile phone when I am not using it
I often use my mobile phone for no particular reason
Arguments have arisen with others because of my mobile phone use
I interrupt whatever else I do when I am contacted on my mobile phone
I feel connected to others when I use my mobile phone
I lose track of times I use my mobile phone
The thought of being without my mobile phone makes me feel distressed
I have been unable to reduce the number of times I use my mobile phone
I am comfortable using mobile phone technology
I feel confident using mobile phone technology

resources.string: Please respond to each of the questions on the page by selecting one the options. Select the Submit button to send the results
